name: INDG 301 D100
prerequisites: One of INDG (or FNST) 101 or 201W and 111, or permission of the instructor.

name: INDG 401 D100
prerequisites: 45 units, INDG (or FNST) 101 and one of INDG (or FNST) 201W or 250, or permission of the instructor.

name: INDG 419 D100
prerequisites: INDG (or FNST) 101 or 201W, or CRIM 101, or permission of the instructor.

name: INDG 433 D100
prerequisites: 45 units and one of INDG (or FNST) 101 or 201W, or permission of the instructor.

name: INDG 442 D100
prerequisites: 15 units in Indigenous (or First Nations) studies. Corequisite: Permission of an instructor and department.

name: INDG 447 D100
prerequisites: 15 units of INDG (or FNST) courses; permission of an instructor and department approval. Corequisite: Varies depending on topic.
